extension.author: Osiris Team
extension.name: JWPlayer
extension.description: JW Player: Flash Video Player, from http://www.longtailvideo.com
extension.content:
Example simple usage: [code language="oml"][jwplayer="http://content.longtailvideo.com/videos/flvplayer.flv" /][/code] or [code language="oml"][jwplayer url="http://content.longtailvideo.com/videos/flvplayer.flv" width="640" height="380"][/code]
Example complex usage: [code language="oml"][jwplayer url="http://content.longtailvideo.com/videos/flvplayer.flv" width="640" height="380"] [var name="autostart" value="true" /] [var name="repeat" value="single" /] [var name="controlbar" value="none" /] [/jwplayer][/code]
Another syntax: [code language="oml"][jwplayer url="http://content.longtailvideo.com/videos/flvplayer.flv" width="640" height="380"] [var="autostart"]true"[/var] [var="repeat"]single"[/var] [var="controlbar"]none[/var] [/jwplayer][/code]
